frictionless 0.7.0.9000

Reference

Read Data Packages

Read a datapackage.json file and its associated Data Resources from path or URL.

read_package()

Read a Data Package descriptor file (datapackage.json)

read_resource()

Read data from a Data Resource into a tibble data frame

Manipulate Data Packages

Manipulate a Data Package, its associated Data Resources and Table Schemas.

create_package()

Create an empty Data Package

add_resource()

Add a Data Resource

remove_resource()

Remove a Data Resource

get_schema()

Get the Table Schema of a Data Resource

create_schema()

Create a Table Schema for a data frame

Write Data Packages

Write a Data Package and its associated Data Resources to disk.

write_package()

Write a Data Package to disk

Miscellaneous

example_package

Example Data Package
